source.cabd9d49:
data['math status'] = np.where(data['math score']>=threshold,'P','F')
data['reading status'] = np.where(data['math score']>=threshold,'P','F')
data['writing status'] = np.where(data['math score']>=threshold,'P','F')
source.a8f3b9e7:
math_all = data['math status'].value_counts()
math_pass = math_all['P']/(math_all['F']+math_all['P'])
reading_all = data['reading status'].value_counts()
reading_pass = reading_all['P']/(reading_all['F']+reading_all['P'])
writing_all = data['writing status'].value_counts()
writing_pass = writing_all['P']/(writing_all['F']+writing_all['P'])
print(f'Percentage of pass :\n\tMath    : {math_pass}\n\tReading : {reading_pass}\n\tWriting : {writing_pass}')

sns.countplot(data = data ,x ='parental level of education',hue='math status')
plt.show()
